body_html: @robmsylvester shouldn't making changes in the scopes of the cells work? It's working for the other two examples as well. In my opinion, this would be a very ugly workaround; a cleaner solution must exist; maybe we are missing something? ( I got the same error on the seq2seq tutorial as well, tried all of the above solutions).
